data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ellenrieder, Natalia Von, Watson, Gillian W., Kinnee, Scott A. (2018): Identification of Nipaecoccus (Hemiptera: Coccomorpha: Pseudococcidae) species in the United States, with descriptions of Nipaecoccus bromelicola sp. n. and the male of N. floridensis Beardsley. Zootaxa 4444 (2): 163-178, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4444.2.5|1 occurrence
